extendedInfo.description: This live wallpaper simulates a swim through a 3D colony of glowing microbes. Neon Microcosm is descended from the original Microcosm, and features a more intense color scheme and depth-of-field effects.The full version lets you tap the screen to spawn new cells. It also includes several more color themes, and the option to select any colors you like to create your own custom theme.If you have purchased the full version of Microcosm, you don't need the paid version of this app. Microcosm unlocks all of the extra features of Neon Microcosm Full.Neon Microcosm uses some special effects and is intended for high-end phones and tablets. If it is not running smoothly for you, please try reducing the number of particles in the settings, or turning off the depth-of-field effect.[ dkeesto d'keesto software ]

reviews.title: Favourite
reviews.comment: My fav live wallpaper so far, looks great on my asus tf300t on slowest speed, and no spam in free version, added to my to-buy list
reviews.author: Colin Stewart

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Must download. Provides a 3D effect flying neons. Super cool especially when in public it\'s deemed to get attraction.
reviews.author: Vish Shah

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Good live wallpaper. Looks nice and phone doesnt lag either . 5 stars!
reviews.author: Nick Isaacs

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I like the depth of field and the movement of this LWP - really brilliant rendering, but I have it set to the next to slowest speed and I still feel like I get vertigo when I look at it. I would have given it 5 stars, otherwise.  Still unsure if I will purchase the full version because of this. ~Samsung Infuse 4G on Gingerbread
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, but..
reviews.comment: I wish there were more wallpapers of this nature.  It\'s really quite something.  That said, I own microcosm and the extra features in this no longer seem to work..  Pretty frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks cool
reviews.comment: Very nice.  The only problem is that all speeds except the slowest just seem too fast, with too much camera movement.  I think a good live wallpaper shouldn\'t be too disorienting.  Still, it does look great at the slowest speed, so I\'ll probably purchase the full version!
reviews.author: William Cheng

reviews.title: Gotta say
reviews.comment: It looks and runs really really smooth in my LG 4X HD thanks.for such great LWP
